context: New method [locator.contentFrame()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-content-frame) converts a [Locator](/docs/api/class-locator "Locator") object to a [FrameLocator](/docs/api/class-framelocator "FrameLocator"). This can be useful when you have a [Locator](/docs/api/class-locator "Locator") object obtained somewhere, and later on would like to interact with the content inside the frame.
